adrFormatAddress: 2132 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text:
Wonderful staff, gentle doctors. Truly the best experience I've had with a dentist or staff. I've been to a few dental clinics in my life and some I had to pay out of pocket. This practice is the best out of all I've been too, hands down!
If you want a great dental practice, look no further.

originalText.text:
It's an amazing dentist office where they have care in their patients wants and needs.
I came in for Dentures and they did an amazing job. They look like I never lost my Teeth. I will recommend this place to all patients that need dental assistance. They are so kind and caring to the people who walk in and this is my permanent dentist location for now on.

text.text:
It's an amazing dentist office where they have care in their patients wants and needs.
I came in for Dentures and they did an amazing job. They look like I never lost my Teeth. I will recommend this place to all patients that need dental assistance. They are so kind and caring to the people who walk in and this is my permanent dentist location for now on.

originalText.text: The staff was polite upon entering the clinic, but shortly thereafter, they were having audible conversations about a child and his mother while the child was being cared for.  The wait time was disrespectfully long. My son is a baby. We arrived early for his appointment and waited over an hour to be called in. The pediatric dentist was indifferent, had no idea how to treat him and did not want to provide basic cleaning for him.  The dental hygienist working alongside her saved the day. She was phenomenal! Overall, not a pleasant experience and I will never go back there.

text.text: The staff was polite upon entering the clinic, but shortly thereafter, they were having audible conversations about a child and his mother while the child was being cared for.  The wait time was disrespectfully long. My son is a baby. We arrived early for his appointment and waited over an hour to be called in. The pediatric dentist was indifferent, had no idea how to treat him and did not want to provide basic cleaning for him.  The dental hygienist working alongside her saved the day. She was phenomenal! Overall, not a pleasant experience and I will never go back there.

originalText.text: I went to this office for a checkup and cleaning. Staff did not introduce themselves when came in to begin procedure (rude). Dr came in with a CALCULATOR giving me a $25,000 estimate on implants that I did not ask for. Suggesting me to apply for a dental loan.  I left feeling like I wasted my time. However I did get my referral to oral surgeon. I will not go back to this dentist office ever again. Disappointed

originalText.text: This place is very professional and the staff is very sociable and helpful. They gave me my smile back, if you are looking for a good dentist Please come here.
